channel.title: Nested Conditionals :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: We can write code with more complex branching behavior by combining conditionals and, in particular, by nesting conditionals. Let’s see how this works by tackling the following problem. Example Write code that prints different messages based on the value of a number variable. If the number is odd, print nothing. If it is even, print “EVEN”. If it is also positive print “POSITIVE”.
